pageProduct.name: Thompson's One-a-day Echinacea 4000mg 60 Tablets
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Thompson's One-A-Day Echinacea 4000mg a dietary supplement that supports immune system, common cold & general wellbeing.

Thompson's One-A-Day Echinacea is formulated to:
- Support immune system health.
- Support general wellbeing. 
- Reduce the duration & severity of common cold symptoms including sneezing, cough, sore throat and dripping nose.

Suitable For: Vegetarain / Vegan.

Size: 60 Tablets

Oil-Free?: Yes

Alcohol Free?: Yes

KEY FEATURES

• Support immune system health.
• Support general wellbeing.
• Reduce the duration & severity of common cold symptoms.
• Vegetarian/Vegan friendly.

Warnings

Not to be used in children under two years of age without medical advice. If symtoms persist, consult your healthcare professional.

CAUTION

Keep out of reach of children.

Ingredients

Active Ingredients: Active ingredients per tablet:
Echinacea purpurea (Echinacea) dry juice 53.34mg
from fresh top flowering 2400mg
Echinacea purpurea (Echinacea) ext. 250mg
derived from dry root 1500mg
Echinacea angustifolia (Echinacea) ext. 25mg
derived from dry root 100mg

Allergen Free From: Dairy| Egg| Fish| Gluten| Lactose| Nuts| Sesame Seeds

Directions

Do not use if bottle and/or cap seal is missing or broken.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 30°C in a dry place.

Storage Temperature: Below 30°C.

RECYCLABLE INFORMATION

Glass

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
